txt.en: 'If you plan to venture north in the near future, might I ask you to bring a bottle of wine to my friend, Derva? We often make time to visit each other, but work at the winery is hungry for my time.\n\n'Please give it to her with my apologies.'
Miruhir wishes to send some wine to his friend, Derva.

'Oho! I was beginning to wonder when Miruhir would come calling. He's busy at the vineyard you say? I wish I could say that's surprising but that man is in love with his work. That's alright. He'll make time for me sooner than later. He never makes me wait too long.'
Miruhir has asked you to deliver wine to his friend, Derva, at the farm to the north.\n\nDeliver wine to Derva.
